subject: College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Missouri Coach Mike Anderson borrowed the Tigers' style of play from his mentor, Nolan Richardson, but has traveled his own bumpy path to this N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: Missouri Coach Mike Anderson borrowed the Tigers' style of play from his mentor, Nolan Richardson, but has traveled his own bumpy path to this N.C.A.A. tournament.
